thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Terminus Nord - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Not somewhere to return to
thread.title_full: Not somewhere to return to - Review of Mercure Paris Terminus Nord, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ceinwen R
title: Not somewhere to return to
text:
The bathroom needed a refurb - mould inexpertly covered with mastik, dirty grouting, enamel missing in bath, part of the toilet bowl surround broken, very dirty carpet, view of a brick wall.
Breakfast was complete chaos with not enough room to seat all the guests; peopling milling everywhere with hot cups of coffee. No attempt made to open a second eating area or buffet.
Location is dodgy - not somewhere you want to be out in the dark
Only saving grace was the friendly and helpful staff
